column1: I have to admit I was leary of exfoliating trice a day as well as using the rough feeling pad after washing. However, thanks to L'Oréal Paris and Buzzagent giving me the opportunity to try this line free I gage it a chance. They really prepared and did their research on this one! My skin looks fantastic and feels incredibly smooth! Well worth the retail cost. I'm considering replacing my higher end regular products with Revitalift! I can not argue with results! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
We have noticed a definite improvement in skin texture, brightness, and firmness of skin.

I bought this a week ago and use it morning and night. I have drastically seen a difference in my face! I have comdonal closed acne and nothing had worked from OTC to prescription. This is the first thing to actually work!!! I use it with my other revitalift glycolic products!! I am in love and I want to say thank you for making products that actually work!!!

My 33 year old daughter bought this for herself last year. She barely ever used it so she casually gave it to me. I'm so ecstatic that she did because this is the only face wash I use now. In the year I've been using this my skin has become so smooth and soft and I've had a noticeable difference in the depth of wrinkles around my mouth and eyes. I love this so much. And it's inexpensive which makes me love it even more
Thank you L'oreal

Ok so I loved this as a exfoliator but .... I made a mistake and slept in this and it gave me a straight up chemical peel... A great one at that! I needed a peel for my dark spots and they're all gone.. I didn't do this on purpose though so I wouldnt suggest anyone trying this because skin is so different but I may try it again on my dark spots.. This seriously has gylocic acid so use wisely. If you sleep in it you will peel big time..trust me

When I first wash my face with this product, my face felt sticky and not smooth or soft. After second wash it start to feel smooth and soft. Don't need a lot to wash, try maybe a pea size first and don't need a lot of pressure when scubing. I made a mistake doing it and my face was irritated.
I only uses it whenever I have to wear make up the whole day and I love how it deeply cleanses and exfoliates my skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

If you are looking for a good product to take the dullness out of your skin and add a glow without doing it harshly this product is perfect. I noticed a new softness and glow within days of starting this product, which I use in conjuction with the makeup wipes and moisturizer.

So I am 57 years old and am blessed with really good fair skin. Was fortunate to have a Grandmother who insisted I wear sunscreen from age 10. I am noticing fine lines around my eyes and lips and blotchy dry skin on my neck and cheeks.I try new products constantly and when I saw this I grabbed it. I noticed softer skin the first use. There is a noticeable difference overall. My skin doesn't feel stripped of moisture. Give it a try. I think you will love it.

I have tried all the Loreal revitalift cleansers and loved this Bright reveal scrub cleanser the most. The texture and the uneven skin tone has really improved and my face looks smooth and brighter. The pores have vanished after using Loreal revitalift cleansers and creams.

This is amazing face wash!! I love how smooth my face is. I buy a lot of high end beauty products and this face wash is comparable if not better. Thank you Loreal Paris for allowing me to try this free of charge. There is no question I'll purchase in the future! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been using this cleanser for many months after receiving a sample from L'Oreal. I switched from Aveeno daily brightener because this cleanser also exfoliates. I haven't noticed a big difference in brightness and I use it religiously twice a day. I do like that my sensitive skin is not irritated or dried out by this product. I do think it gets my skin cleaner than the Aveeno; which I noticed left makeup behind. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This product is really nice, compare to other scrubs, it's gentle and doesn't scratch or tear at the skin.
I do notice a brighter appearance, and smooth feel after a few days of use. It's been just about a week and I like the results and how refresh I feel after every scrub.
That is why I'm going to continue to use and try to bulk buy more, once I see a great deal.

Love this facial wash! it can tingle intermittently. However, the powerful, work that it does mean more to me. I have Melasma with menopausal skin, that needs a constant powerful regimen for sloughing-off dead skin cells, more rapidly than most. So, this is one non-oily, more of a serum-gel-type, facial wash that works for my skin type. Thanks for the formula!

I have never had good skin - now at 60+ I have finally found a great cleanser, actually does improve tone and texture, and can see the difference. Glycolic acid much better than salicylic acid for my skin. To L'Oreal:Please do not change the formulation!

I bougth this two week ago.I love the results,does wonders.My face is so clear smooth radiant aand healthy.My face is so baby soft. I love this cleanser is not smushy,or greasy,or clumpy.It has a perfect texture and frangrance good price too for its size. And great value for your money wirth getting ,I highly recommend. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

LOVE THIS GENTLE SCRUB. IT has tiny microbeads that feel so good against my skin. my face feels so smooth and clean. I follow up with the Revitalift products. I'm seeing a difference in my skin texture. This seems to be perfect for skin beginning to show signs of aging.
I have been using this product for the past 6 months. I am very happy with the results. My face used to be dull in completion, but now it is much brighter. I'm one satisfied customer!!

I love using the Revitalift Brightening products!!! They work well with my skin and really do reveal a brighter complexion. I think I have found my new skin care regime!!!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I bought this product last year, and I've been using it since . A little goes a long way . Super creamy and leaves your skin feeling clean and smooth.

I bought the complete line of Brightening products. I love this cleanser the most. It didn't strip my skin's natural oils. My face felt smoother and looked a little brighter. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I just started using it, but I am able to see a light difference. I will continue using it as directed and expect to see even more of a difference on my face.
I purchased the revitalift daily cleanser a couple days ago. I do not use it daily but it does leave skin feeling nice. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I absolutely love the fresh orange scent! It leaves skin feeling clean and looking radiant. You definitely need a good moisturizer when you use this in winter. This is now my favorite face wash!

I got my first tube of this probably three years ago as a sample. Regardless, I loved it so much, I am on my third tube that I have purchased out of my own funds. I keep it in my shower and use it two times a week. It is the only manual exfoliant I use. I find it to be gentle, but effective. If I feel l need a little pick me up, I'l leave it on a bit longer for a in-shower mask. The scrubby bits are gentle, but effective enough to help purge the occasional pesky blackhead.

I've been using this for only three days and I notice a difference after the second day! I have sunspots and some dark spots from overplucking. The dark spots from overplucking have almost completely disappeared. I wish I would have taken a before picture. My skin is very soft and smoothe. I've also noticed that some fine lines in between my eyebrows seem more faint. Thank you Revitalift! Thank you thank you!

Started using this about 2 weeks ago and WOW. It really exfoliates, both gently but effectively. The clarity and tone of my skin has drastically improved. It also has a very pretty scent. My husband admitted to "borrowing" it a few times this week and he is very impressed, stating that he feels like he has "new skin". Will continue to purchase this!

I have been having issues with blemishes and acne in the last 2 years or so, but has gotten much worse in the last six months or so. This face wash has been helping out so much as long as I make sure I wash with it nightly. If I miss a night or two in a row I'll begin to notice acne popping up again.

i love this product, when i first tried the SPF30 face moisturizer i was hooked i had to get the face wash and i am soooo glad that i did it works wonders, it removes the dead skin on your face and all the dirt and leaves your skin looking and glowing like new, but i wasn't sure if i should buy this or Garnier face products, i am so glad i bought this instead and i will continue to buy it from now on.
I love it is very good product .the exfoliation is deep. And you can see and feel your skin super rejuvenating
Do not buy this product! I just used once and my face really hurts!
This stuff is absolutely amazing! I use this every night after I remove my makeup. It is so exfoliating but not too much and it makes your skin so smooth and shiny! 100% recommend this to anyone!

I first tried this product a year ago and I really like it. I love when my skin feels completely cleansed and this does it. I would highly recommend giving this product a try. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I really like this scrub. It is gentle and gets the job done as far as cleansing and making my skin look brighter. Using this product has definitely minimized outbreaks.
This product is an excellent face scrub. After using this I feel fresh and like my skin is glowing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I purchased this yesterday and saw immediate results. I love it. Can you tell me how I can sign up to get trial products. I am very interested in this line and would like to sample other items.

I received this free through Bzzz Agent and love it . My skin is brighter , less pores and even my acne is going away . Definitely going to buy this when the tube I received free runs out . [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Excellent product

I got this product free to test and review and so far I am loving it!. I have sensitive skin and it is mild and works great. It really cleans my face well. it does have a mild sent but not overwhelming. I really love it and would defiantly buy it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been using this cleanser for 3 months. i like loreal brand i work in retail and whenever i try different loreal products i always suggest to my customer and now customers are buying this product alot . this product makes your face bright, clean and gives you good feeling .
it makes my skin nice and smooth. i love that cleanser for my night routine
I've been using this almost 3 weeks and I haven't noticed any results.
I have only been using this for a week but absolutely love how it makes my face feel afterwards!
I added this to my weekly regimen and it works great my skin has never looked better. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I love how this makes my skin feel so smooth. I can really tell that is evening out my skin and helps a lot with texture!
I love to use Bright Reveal Brightening Daily Scrub Cleanser
great product [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I purchased this item along with other products from the Bright Reveal line around the first of January. I had high hopes.

This face scrub does make your face feel soft, and it certainly does a great job of removing all makeup, etc., from your face. However, I do not feel that over a month of using it twice a day that it has made my complexion brighter. I will not be repurchasing this product, and I do not recommend it.

I have fair to light skin and starting noticing a few dark spots from sun damage. This product erased the dark spots after a week or so of use and leaves my skin looking brighter, fresher and younger! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using the Bright Reveal scrub and the Cell Renewal rosy for about 2 weeks. I'm not sure which one is working, but my face has become more plump, my wrinkles are noticeably less, and i'm not using as much concelear on my age spots as i was. Thank you Loreal! I'm still in shock at the difference! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have combination skin with adult acne so I'm always looking for a good cleanser. My dermatologist recommended using a face wash with glycolic acid in it and I found this lovely product. As soon as I used it, I began noticing a difference. It made my skin smoother and cleaned right down into my pores.

I was surprised that after just one use, my face felt fresher and smoother. After a week of twice daily use my skin was less dull and softer. Now after using this facial scrub for almost 2months, the sunspots on my checks and nose have really lightened up and wrinkles around my mouth are less noticeable. I will continue to use this as my daily cleanser! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

After using this product for several days, I definitely feel like my skin is brighter and clearer. Wearing no makeup is not a challenge because my skin looks so great because of using this scrub everyday. It is not harsh on my sensitive skin and did not break me out and the smell is pretty pleasant. While it does exfoliate, it's a gentle one, and rinses clean. I'd definitely buy it if the price point were much lower! However, this is a great product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This cleanser is great! I used it every morning and night. The gentle exfoliant in this cleanser leaves my skin feeling free of dullness and full of brightness! My skin used to be flaky, but since I've been using this, it looks great! If you have dry sensitive flaky red skin this is worth a try. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved the Revitalift Daily cleaning scrub. I use it every morning in the shower and just love the way it makes my skin feel! It really does seem to make my skin brighter and it just feels clean and refreshed! It smells great too but not over fragrancy. I use it on my chest and neck as well and it never irritated my sensitive skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved how my skin felt after using Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening Daily Scrub Cleanser. My skin felt much smoother than it does after most cleansers. The thing I liked the most is I could feel it exfoliate, but it didn't scrub my face harshly as some exfoliating products do. It didn't leave my face red and splotchy. This product did a good job of cleaning, and I would use it again! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Used this as part of my morning and evening facial cleanser for the past 2 weeks along with the Moisturizer and Brightening Peel Pads. This helps makes my skin looking brighter and clearer. Highly recommend this product! I think this works very well with the moisturizer and brightening peel pads. I recommend using all three products to complement and make your skin looking great sooner. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Im 45 mom of 5. I dont have a lot time for me so my face routine is important as a small pamper me time. I have this facial scrub to be effective, gentle, but effective all in one go. I could easly see me carrying this one in my car and use with facial wipes for those days when I'm sweating or more oily for quick clean up and refresh. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This daily cleansing scrub works well on my sensitive, combination skin. My T-Zone acne is diminished, my pores are tighter, my skin looks fresher and renewed. This skincare regime is effective at combating two things that can't usually be managed with one line, for me that's acne and skin dullness/fine lines. The scent is mild. The exfoliation is gentle. This is really worth it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think L'Oreal Bright Reveal Brightening Daily Scrub Cleanser is a must have for every ones daily skin regimen. I was excited to try this product that I received from BzzAgent. I loved the clean fresh scent and how this scrub cleaned my skin. It left my skin feeling clean, fresh, and bright. My skin looked and felt wonderful. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Just when you think your skin can't get any duller, this Daily face wash reveals a brighter more radiant skin that has been hiding. This daily cleanser is rich and delicate enough to use daily without stripping your skin of essential oils. My skin looked brighter and more toned after 2 weeks, without dryness. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I typically use an all natural sugar or sea salt scrub which is quite a bit rougher of an exfoliant. This product did exfoliate fairly well and I would use it as a gentle every day cleaner, but I still felt the need to use my sugar scrub. I think this might be quite effective for some., but for me, this would have to be purchased in addition to my scrub and I dont feel the product is that spectacularc to warrant the additional purchase. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

So, after trying out the whole kit of Loreal Paris Brightening Daily Scrub, my face feels much brighter, and softer than before, i didn't see any difference with my fine lines but It was easy to use, it's felt so good scrubbing my face especially when I was done with the prices and my face felt to fresh and clean!! I will defiantly refined this scrub to my friends and family #Buzzagent # Loreal Paris Brightening Daily scrub. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The cleanser was "good enough" for the days that my face didn't feel to grimy in the mornings, but on days where it was especially humid out I was a bit less than impressed. I like the scrub factor, but would have preferred a bit more foaming action. While this formula doesn't dry my face (I truly appreciate that) it also doesn't make my face feel especially clean, all the time. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I had the opportunity of trying the new L'Oreal Paris Revitalift Bright Reveal collection. All I can say is that I have switched my daily cleanser to L'oreal Paris Daily Scrub Cleanser. It leaves your face so clean and with a great fresh feeling. It not only does its job, but the smell is very pleasant. Happy new customer for L'Oreal Paris Brightening Daily Scrub Cleaner. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love how this product made my face feel after washing my face with it. My face was so fresh and felt so clean. I also notice my skin becoming clearer. Only very little is needed so the product last for a great amount of time. I think this product is the one for me! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think my skin feels smoother and looks brighter since I started using Loreal Revitalift Bright Rteveal Brightening Daily Scrub Cleanser. I love the refreshing smell of the product. I will buy more of the Reviatlift products in the future. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

As far as a exfoliate goes this product is a a good exfoliate. However I did not notice that it was much if any better than the other brands I have used in te past.I really did not notice that it made my skin any brighter either. I also noticed that it claims to have basically the same results as the peel pads and I did not understand why I should have to use both each day. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really like this cleanser because it's not too harsh for my sensitive skin. It gently exfoliates and is something I can use every day. I feel like my skin tone is more even and my skin looks fresher after using this product. At night, I use the cleanser and my sonic facial cleansing brush to remove my makeup. This cleanser works really well at getting all the makeup off my face without having to use the cleanser more than once!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

After using Revtalift Bright Reveal Brightening Daily Scrub Cleanser for 30 days I have noticed my skin looks brighter, fresher and more toned. I have to say after 30 days it makes me look younger, which is always a plus in my book. I had people in the office stop me asking what I was doing different. I told them about bzzagent and how I got the product to try. Many co workers went out to buy the products and a few signed up. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think it was a little too harsh for my skin. I started peeling and my skin started getting red so I did have to stop the treatments. I was looking forward to brighter skin, but may have a little too much drying agents for my skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have used this for a few months and have liked it from the beginning. The micro beads were much finer than many other products I've tried and I like the grapefruit scent. My face felt soft, and clean. My skin was much brighter. The only problem I had was after using daily for @ a month, my skin felt dryer. I have changed my routine to only using it every other morning only. Now I'm much happier with the product@!

I would purchase this again for a cleanser/exfoliated, but I would not purchase it strictly for it's brightening claims. But I was not able to use the whole system because the moisturizers broke me out. It does a good job exfoliating. When I was rubbing it in it didn't feel like it was cleansing well (it's hard to explain) but it actually did a good job. Maybe because it doesn't suds up. Also, when rinsing it felt like something was being left behind. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've struggled over the years to find something that makes my face feel clean without feeling harsh on my skin. I was pleasantly surprised by how I felt after using the Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening Daily Scrub Cleanser. It really did the job but has not caused the irritation a lot of other products have. I would recommend the product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am loving this cleanser. It has a nice fresh smell that reminds me of summertime. It has micro-beads which is something I usually look for when shopping for a facial cleanser. It has not dried my face out nor does it get oily. I would definitely recommend this product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really like the daytime and night time cream and i also used the scrub, I didn't care much for the smell. It was a citrus smell and i didn't care much for it. But, as a scrub and moisturizer i really did like it very much. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was so excited to start using this system. I liked that I was receiving a full system from the same company. I used all the products daily for 20 days. On the 20th day, I decided that I gave it enough time and my face was so broke out by then. The cleanser has a nice scent to it, but I feel like when it was used with the whole system, my face broke out. On its own, it's probably a good cleanser, but I used as part of the whole system so I can't attest to it being that great. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have tried numerous products and broke out. Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening Daily Scrub Cleanser is amazing on your skin. I work outside and break out time to time , this product clears your skin and gives it a brightness just as the name describes. I have not found many products that live up to their name. This one does to a T. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I used Revitalit Daily scrub until it was gone. I love the scent, light and fresh. It's just the right consistency and doesn't used microbeads. Loreal's Brightening Scrub really feels like it's scrubbing down to a fresh layer of skin without irritation. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am coming to the end and I just want to say that I love the L'Oréal Revitalift Bright Reveal combo and I am for sure going to keep buying it and keeping it in my skin care line. I used it every day and night as directed and I can see a big difference in my skin it feels so silky soft and looks so much more healthy and youthful. I had a lot of dark spots on my face and I can see them fading away and my skin tone evening out so it's doing what it's supposed to do. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I used this scrub in the morning and evening. A little goes a long way. Moving in a circular motion, it forms a generous lather. This is gentle enough for daily use but packed with the good Stuff, like Glycolic. This is essential before application if creams and serum to allow for maximum absorption. I have definitely noticed more Radiant and even skin. No more struggle with dullness [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using this scrub for over a month and i really love it. The scrub smells like oranges and has really big micro beads. I thought this was going to cause more redness and more peeling but it did not. This cleanser is seriously powerful and is very effective in exfoliating the outer layer of my skin. Right after using it, I can feel that my skin is smoother and, in fact, more evenly toned. This actually rinses away easily! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was very excited to try the Revitalift Loreal line. As soon as i recieved it i tried it out. The scrub went on well and it left my skin feeling silky smooth. I had to give it such a low rating due to the fact that the product line caused me to have an alleriace reaction. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutely love L'Oréal revitalize bright reveal brightening face scrub! It leaves my face feeling clean, soft and it looks so much healthier. It doesn't dry my skin out or make it oily like lots of others have. This will be part of my daily skin routine. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been using the L'Oreal Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening Daily Scrub for almost 30 days now. At first I was worried that using it at night and in the morning would dry out my skin but it's gentle enough that it hasn't been a problem. My skin looks brighter and younger and feels softer. I love this product and will continue to use it after the trial. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening Daily Scrub is absolutely amazing. I have had dry dull skin for as long as I can remember. After using this product in the morning and at night I noticed a big change in my skin after just a few weeks. My skin is much smoother and not dull looking. I no longer have dry areas on my face. This product has become a regular part of my skin care and will continue to be. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I used the scrub every morning and night. It left my face feeling smooth, soft, refreshed and revived. It is not abrasive. It did not leave my face looking red or feeling irritated. In the mornings my face looked youthful and bright. I especially love the scent. It has just the right amount of scent, it is not overpowering. I will definitely be purchasing it in the future and recommending to friends and family. This will forever remain part of my skincare routine. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really love the cleanser; it's hard to find a drugstore brand cleanser that fits the sweet spot between too moisturizing and too drying. This one smells great, works well, and leaves my skin soft. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Wow I don't where to start I'm a loving this collection of skin care. I have notice the change in my face everyday as I continue to use it. My face more brighter, skin tone is more even and brown pigmentation is slowly going away. 8befire I used the reveal collection I had pigmentation on my fire head and my nose. 8i really can say it's going away. I tried other products and the scrub has been a part of collection to help with that [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think this is a great face scrub to use in the morning shower. The smell is so great! I love how it smells clean with a light citrus scent. It lathers up well but doesn't feel soapy. It helps exfoliate your face gently. My face felt smoother and cleaner after using it. If you normally like to exfoliate your face I would recommend this product for a brighter, refreshed and more even skin tone. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is a good cleanser but I wasn't able to use it daily. I have sensitive skin and this cleanser has SLS that dried my skin a lot. Leaving that detail aside, this is a fairly good cleanser, my skin felt clean and was glowing. I would recommend this to people that don't sensitive skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this stuff and I don't think I could ever go without it. It's that good. I use it morning and night. The scrub is not to harsh on my skin and makes my skin feel so clean and fresh. It doesn't take much of the product so it will last a while.. my skin looks so much brighter and radiant I will definitely keep this as part of my skincare routine. Morning and night. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have used Oil of Olay and Aveeno but I am now addicted to this line of products! The Loreal revitalization cleanser with the microbeads leaves my skin feeling super clean and rinses cleanly away. I will be solely using the Loreal Revitalizing line! I cannot say enough great things about it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening Scrub is an amazing product. After one was, my face felt smoother, brighter, and more refreshed. I even made my husband feel my face and see how smooth it was! I absolutely love this product and will be buying more in the future! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think the Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening Daily Scrub Cleanser is the best scrub product I have try for my face . I was looking for the best scrub for my age, 43. Some seen to dry my skin and others gave me allergies. I will specially keep buying this brand and recommend it . [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think the L'Oreal Bright Reveal is awesome. The pads make my skin feel so clean. I use them every morning. It makes my skin brighter and more radiant. People have commented that my skin looks great. I give the credit to L'Oreal Bright Reveal. I will definitely keep this line of skincare as part of my routine. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think this is the best daily scrub I have ever used. I keep this in the shower and use it everyday. I love how gentle the scrub feels when I apply it. It makes my skin feel very even and smooth after usage. I will definitely keep this product as part of my daily skincare routine - it is easy to use, convenient and effective! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Cleanser smells fabulous and leaves my skin smooth and ready to absorb other products. I gave 4 stars because I don't know that I would use daily but I definitely will use when I want to exfoliate so maybe 3 times a week for me is enough. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product leaves my face cleaner than many other products and my skin is glowing. I recommend. I use daily in the morning, very gently because of the texture of the cleaner, and that's really all I need. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really like the texture of this daily scrub cleanser and the way my skin feels afterwards. It is not too rough, but has just the right amount of scubbing. I feel that it helps to get rid of the dead skin and reveal the brighter skin underneath. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've always been critical of facial products but decided to give the L'Oréal 30 day challenge a try; I'm sure glad I did! I liked the feel of the daily scrub cleanser on my face and the fact that it removed dead skin cells to reveal new and bright skin underneath, plus its fragrance was just right for me! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is the BEST cleanser I have ever tried! I noticed an immediate improvement to my skin after using it the 1st time. I haven't used any other cleanser since getting this & will absolutely continue using it! My skin was instantly younger looking & not dull at all. It was not harsh or irritating & easily rinsed off. 10/10 will definitely buy. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening Daily Scrub Cleanser has become an essential part of my daily skin care routine. I use this product twice each day...once in the morning and once in the evening. It leaves my skin feeling super clean.
